message: Google site search is one way to do it, but I am curious about other possibilities
I want to add a search capabilities to a website hosted with GitHub pages. What are the options available?
Thats is one possibility. Kind of like sphinx does it.
you could build a static index that spits out json & hook jquery autocomplete to it
or you could use couchdb (CouchOne or Cloudant) instead of GitHub pages ;) Free accts like Heroku, but no multi-second delay after not visiting a site for hours to start a web framework process.
